body: Chris, Thanks very much for your response.   I'm still confounded here - no separate GH canvas is open, and all the HB components are ver 0.0.61.  I did grab the latest HB_HB (Feb 27) from github to see if that would solve, but same result.  Clearly though this is something with my configuration since you were able to get the thmx output.  I suppose I could wipe & reinstall LB/HB as next step, although I did try this once already a couple rounds of troubleshooting ago. Below screenshot in case it's any help:  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9e-LbPNbsUv7DPkFUDUIQyXKtDcbCwwP0lZHiMd8dXrO0-ybXUpsSXMEEv4StfSJt3eTOft3l--nUOMqlhQ*4KpgdEsohqgO/Screen.jpg)
